posts.postText:

Why should we unban you?: I don't recall ever joining your servers, I just try to join and get banned.

EDIT: Meant to say "I just tried to join and got the banned message"
If you want me to clarify, it was a speedhack.
Okay, but I still don't remember ever joining your servers prior to today.
Are you sure?? Cause that name rings a bell or i might have seen something similar to that name.
I've seen you on NNJG before, but I don't have the necessary means to check for hacks like gash does(aside from Obvious hacks).
